title: (x) slab serif used in Pulp Fiction type animation - Rockwell {Vincent Grouls (via Yves)}
content:
Hello everyone,

could anyone enlighten me on what slab serif has been used in this:

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wF8f8w6HPoo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010719/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=wF8f8w6HPoo "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wF8f8w6HPoo")

Screenshot for convenience (but worth a look...)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010719im_/http:/typophile.com/files/marsellus_4433.png)

 [‹ (x) Starbucks shop front type - custom (similar to Freight Sans) {Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010719/http:/typophile.com/node/32225 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) credits at the bottom of movie posters - Univers 39 UltraCond, URW Bee {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010719/http:/typophile.com/node/32251 "Go to next forum topic")
author: all about seb

comments.content: nope, scratch that, wrong lower-case e, try rockwell
Can’t believe my name got misspelt lol.

Ha ha. You’re lucky I credited you there... Coulda just pretended like I was any good at ID-ing :-P

Thanks for changing it :-)
